importantArticles.headline: Madison Mills and Julie Hyman take a look at some of Wednesday's trending tickers on Yahoo Finance. Chipmaker stocks, like Nvidia (NVDA), Advanced Micro Devices (AMD), and Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company (TSM), are under pressure as investors wait for US President Donald Trump's tariff announcement. European automakers, including Volkswagen (VOW3.DE), Mercedes-Benz (MBG.DE), and Ferrari (RACE.MI), are in focus as Trump's tariffs on auto imports weigh on the sector.
